overview: Women of the South, is a tribute to women in the countryside. Faithful testimony of women who were born and bred in that environment. Showing their stories represents a way of spreading the knowledge about the culture of a part of the country that otherwise may remind unknown, the southern towns of Merida state, where Ana Maria Brice√±o , Maria Elizabeth Gomez and Elizabeth Contreras , are just examples of this history.
title: Mujeres del Sur
